Summary._: [1] [2] [3] [N] [R] [Q] [W] and [7] trains are bypassing Times Sq-42 St in both directions, [A] [C] and [E] trains are bypassing 42 St/Port Authotiy.

Description._:
[1] [2] [3] [N] [Q] [R] [W] and [7] trains are bypassing Times Sq-42 St in both directions.

[A] [C] and [E] trains are bypassing 42 St/Port Authority-Bus Terminal in both directions.

There is no [S] 42 St shuttle service in both directions.

[A] and [C] trains are stopping along the [D] line between W 4 St-Washington Sq and 59 St-Columbus Circle in both directions.

There is no [B] train service between Bedford Park Blvd and Brighton Beach in both directions.

[E] Trains are stopping along the [F] line between Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av and W 4 St-Washington Sq in both directions.

No [L] train service between 8 Av and 6 Av in both directions.

[M] Trains are running between Delancey-Essex St and Forest Hills-71 Av.

These service changes are because of an NYPD investigation at 42 St/Port Authority-Bus Terminal.

[A] [C] and [E] trains are bypassing 42 St/Port Authority-Bus Terminal in both directions.
There is no [S] 42 St shuttle service in both directions.

[E] Trains are stopping along the [F] line between Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av and W 4 St-Washington Sq in both directions.
No [L] train service between 8 Av and 6 Av in both directions.

These service changes are because of an NYPD investigation at 42 St/Port Authority-Bus Terminal.

Summary._: TRACK & TRACK PLATE INSTALLATION, REPLACEMENT OF POWER & COMMUNICATION CABLES  [2] [3] Trains run at reduced speed through the Clark St Tunnel between Manhattan and Brooklyn

Description._: TRACK & TRACK PLATE INSTALLATION, REPLACEMENT OF POWER & COMMUNICATION CABLES  [2] [3] Trains run at reduced speed through the Clark St Tunnel between Manhattan and Brooklyn

LongDescription: <b><i>TRACK & TRACK PLATE INSTALLATION, REPLACEMENT OF POWER & COMMUNICATION CABLES</i><br clear=left>[2] [3] Trains run at reduced speed through the Clark St Tunnel between Manhattan and Brooklyn</b>All times, Monday to Friday, Dec 4 - 8    Dec 11 - 15  <br><br>The slower speed will keep everyone safe as our crews make critical repairs to the tunnel.<br><br> Please allow additional travel time.<br><b><br>
